Name: Sign Up / Registration
User Goal: New user creates an account and organization
Verification Steps: Navigate to /signup, fill form, submit, check email

Name: Sign In / Sign Out
User Goal: User authenticates to access dashboard
Verification Steps: Navigate to /auth/signin, enter credentials, submit

Name: Password Reset
User Goal: User resets forgotten password via email link
Verification Steps: Navigate to forgot-password, enter email, check inbox, reset

Name: Accept Team Invite
User Goal: Invited user joins an existing organization
Verification Steps: Receive invite email, click link, complete registration

Name: Create Board
User Goal: User creates a new board for a period
Verification Steps: Navigate to /dashboard/boards, click New Board, fill form, submit

Name: Edit Board Settings
User Goal: User modifies board name, dates, or settings
Verification Steps: Click board row, edit, save

Name: View Board with Jobs
User Goal: User views all jobs assigned to a board
Verification Steps: Navigate to /dashboard/jobs, select board from dropdown

Name: Assign Board Collaborators
User Goal: User adds team members to collaborate on a board
Verification Steps: Click board, add team member

Name: Set Board Cadence / Periods
User Goal: User selects board cadence during creation
Verification Steps: Create board: select Board Type (Daily/Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly/Year-End/Ad-Hoc) → auto-calculates periodStart and generates board name. Note: cadence cannot be changed after creation (intentional - would break period logic).

Name: Mark Board Complete
User Goal: User marks board done, triggering snapshots for comparison
Verification Steps: Navigate to boards, change status to Complete

Name: Archive / Restore Board
User Goal: User archives old boards or restores them
Verification Steps: Click archive icon on board

Name: Delete Board
User Goal: User permanently removes a board
Verification Steps: Click delete action on board, confirm

Name: AI Summarize Board Status
User Goal: AI generates summary of board completion, risks, and blockers
Verification Steps: Call GET /api/boards/[id]/ai-summary - returns summary, risks, recommendations

Name: Manage Table Column Visibility
User Goal: User shows, hides, or reorders system columns in the jobs table view
Verification Steps: Click gear icon in table header → toggle visibility, use arrows to reorder. System columns: Task/Type/Status/Owner/Due Date/Notes/Files/Responses.

Name: Configure Board Automation
User Goal: User enables/disables auto-creation of next period board
Verification Steps: Create board: toggle 'Auto-create next period'. Edit board: toggle 'When this board completes, automatically create the next period'.

Name: Auto-Create Next Period Board
User Goal: System auto-creates next period board when period ends
Verification Steps: Daily cron at midnight checks boards where: automationEnabled=true AND cadence!=AD_HOC AND periodEnd < now AND status!=COMPLETE. Auto-marks COMPLETE, snapshots tasks, creates next period.

Name: Copy Tasks to Next Period
User Goal: System copies tasks from completed board to new period (empty)
Verification Steps: spawnTaskInstancesForNextPeriod() copies: name, description, owner, type, lineageId, collaborators, labels. Does NOT copy: requests, attachments, collection items. TABLE tasks carry forward structuredData as beginning balance.

Name: Manage Board Table Columns
User Goal: User shows, hides, or reorders columns in the boards list table view
Blockers: API and UI component not yet implemented
Verification Steps: 1) Create API: /api/boards/column-config (GET/PATCH) storing config in Organization.settings.boardColumns. 2) Create component: components/boards/board-column-header.tsx (copy pattern from column-header.tsx). 3) Update app/dashboard/boards/page.tsx to add gear icon and dynamic column rendering.
Fix Plan: Create API route + UI component following existing job column pattern

Name: Create Generic Job
User Goal: User creates a standard job for tracking requests
Verification Steps: Navigate to /dashboard/jobs, click New Job, fill form, submit

Name: Create Table Job
User Goal: User creates a table-type job (enables Table capability)
Blockers: No dedicated Create Table Job wizard UI; Schema requires lineage first
Verification Steps: Create TABLE type job, navigate to Data tab, edit schema
Fix Plan: Add Table Job option with inline schema editor

Name: Create Reconciliation Job (V1)
User Goal: User creates reconciliation job (enables Reconciliation capability). V1 supports Excel/CSV, PDF, and image files.
Evidence: components/jobs/reconciliation-upload-modal.tsx (file type icons, anchor role dropdown), lib/constants/reconciliation.ts (ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS includes pdf/png/jpg)
Verification Steps: Create RECONCILIATION job → select Anchor (can be Excel, PDF, or image) → select anchor role (General Ledger, Trial Balance, etc.) → upload 1+ Supporting docs (any format) → optionally describe intent → V1 processor extracts signals from unstructured docs → view results with confidence badge

Name: Import / Edit Table Data
User Goal: User imports CSV data, edits cells, signs off dataset
Verification Steps: Import CSV, edit cell, sign off dataset

Name: Compare Periods / Variance
User Goal: User compares current vs prior period data
Verification Steps: Click Compare tab, view variance data

Name: Archive / Restore Job
User Goal: User archives completed jobs or restores them
Verification Steps: Click archive action on job

Name: Delete Job
User Goal: User permanently removes a job
Verification Steps: Click delete action on job, confirm

Name: AI Process Anchored Reconciliation (V1)
User Goal: V1: AI processes anchor (source of truth) vs supporting docs. Supports PDF signal extraction (totals, dates, references) and image analysis via OpenAI Vision. Outputs: confidence score (0-100), key findings, suggested next steps.
Verification Steps: Upload anchor (Excel/PDF/image) → AI extracts signals → compares with accounting context (task name, board, period) → generates V1 output with confidence + explanation + findings + next steps → export working paper includes V1 fields

Name: Save Recurring Reconciliation Template
User Goal: User saves completed reconciliation as reusable template for future periods. Template stores anchor role, supporting roles, default intent, and prior AI explanation.
Verification Steps: Complete reconciliation → click 'Save Template' button → creates/updates ReconciliationTemplate with: name (from job), anchorRole, supportingRoles, defaultIntent, priorExplanation → links reconciliation to template

Name: Manage Job Stakeholders
User Goal: User assigns external contacts as stakeholders
Verification Steps: Add stakeholder from contacts

Name: Manage Job Collaborators
User Goal: User adds internal team members to a job
Verification Steps: Click Add Collaborator, select team member

Name: Assign / Change Job Owner
User Goal: User transfers job ownership
Verification Steps: Click owner field, select new owner

Name: Set / Manage Job Deadlines
User Goal: User sets or updates job due dates
Verification Steps: Click deadline field, select date

Name: Manage Job Attachments
User Goal: REMOVED: Functionality covered by Evidence Collection (WF-06a)
Blockers: Duplicate functionality - use Evidence Collection instead
Verification Steps: N/A
Fix Plan: None - use WF-06a Evidence Collection for file management

Name: Manage Job Notes
User Goal: User adds internal notes to a job
Verification Steps: Edit notes field, save

Name: Job Activity & Comments
User Goal: User views activity log and adds comments
Verification Steps: View activity timeline, add comment

Name: Job Status & Lifecycle
User Goal: User changes job status
Verification Steps: Click status dropdown, select new status

Name: Send Standard Request
User Goal: User sends request emails to existing job stakeholders with AI-drafted content
Verification Steps: Open Send Request modal, select Standard Request (requires stakeholders), AI drafts email, send

Name: Send Data Personalization Request
User Goal: User uploads CSV/Excel with recipients, creates personalized emails with merge fields
Verification Steps: Open Send Request modal, select Data Personalization, upload CSV/Excel, map columns, compose with merge fields {{Name}}, preview, send

Name: Configure Request Reminders
User Goal: User sets up automatic reminder schedules
Verification Steps: Enable reminders toggle, configure frequency

Name: Cancel / Resend Requests
User Goal: REMOVED: Not a necessary feature. Cancel reminders covered by WF-05c. Resend not needed.
Verification Steps: N/A

Name: Track Request Status
User Goal: User monitors response status and risk levels
Verification Steps: Navigate to /dashboard/requests, view list, expand request

Name: Manually Override Request Risk
User Goal: User manually adjusts risk classification via dropdown
Verification Steps: Expand request card → click risk badge dropdown → select new risk level (High/Medium/Low/Unknown). API saves manualRiskOverride field.

Name: Email Open Tracking (Automatic)
User Goal: System automatically tracks email opens via tracking pixel (1x1 gif)
Verification Steps: Tracking pixel embedded in sent emails. When recipient opens, pixel request fires → updates openedAt, triggers risk recomputation if no manual override. User sees 'Opened' status.

Name: Reply Review
User Goal: User reviews replies with AI assistance
Verification Steps: Navigate to /dashboard/review/[messageId], analyze, draft reply

Name: AI Auto-Draft Request Email
User Goal: AI generates initial email draft from job context
Verification Steps: Open Send Request modal - AI generates draft with usedAI indicator

Name: AI Auto-Draft Reminder Email
User Goal: AI generates varied reminder emails based on reminder number
Verification Steps: Click Preview in reminders column - AI generates varied reminder content

Name: AI Auto-Draft Reply
User Goal: AI generates reply draft based on inbound message context with user signature
Verification Steps: Navigate to review page → AI generates draft → fetches user.signature from settings → appends 'Best regards, [signature]'. Regenerate button available.

Name: AI Analyze Inbound Email
User Goal: AI analyzes reply body text AND attachment content. Document Analysis section shows accounting-friendly summaries.
Verification Steps: Navigate to review page → AI Assessment shows findings (attachment findings filtered to Document Analysis section) → Re-analyze button refreshes document extraction → Document Analysis shows per-file summaries with keyDetails and accountingRelevance.

Name: AI Extract Attachment Content
User Goal: AI extracts text from PDF/Excel/CSV for analysis
Verification Steps: Inngest extracts content via pdfjs-dist/xlsx, content passed to AI

Name: AI Determine Completion Status
User Goal: AI determines if submission is complete based on attachment content
Verification Steps: CompletionDetectionService analyzes attachment content, updates completionPercentage

Name: Upload Evidence
User Goal: User manually uploads evidence files
Verification Steps: Click Collection tab, click Upload, select file

Name: Review / Approve Evidence
User Goal: User reviews and approves collected evidence
Verification Steps: Click evidence item, preview, approve/reject

Name: Bulk Evidence Actions
User Goal: User performs bulk approve/reject/delete
Verification Steps: Select multiple items, click bulk action

Name: Export Evidence
User Goal: User exports all collected evidence
Verification Steps: Click Export All button

Name: AI Analyze Evidence Content
User Goal: AI extracts and analyzes content from evidence files (PDF/Excel)
Verification Steps: Evidence content extracted via attachment-extraction.service.ts, analyzed by classify-message Inngest

Name: Create / Edit Contact
User Goal: User creates or updates contact information
Verification Steps: Navigate to /dashboard/contacts, add/edit contact

Name: Import Contacts
User Goal: User bulk imports contacts from CSV
Verification Steps: Click Import, upload CSV, map columns, confirm

Name: Group Contacts
User Goal: User organizes contacts into groups
Verification Steps: Click Groups tab, create group, add contacts

Name: Manage Contact Types / Labels
User Goal: User defines and manages contact classifications
Verification Steps: View/edit contact types

Name: Link Contacts to Jobs
User Goal: User associates contacts with specific jobs
Verification Steps: Add stakeholder from contacts

Name: Search / Select Contacts for Requests
User Goal: User searches and selects recipients
Verification Steps: Type in recipient search box, select from suggestions

Name: Connect Email Account - Gmail
User Goal: User connects Gmail via OAuth
Verification Steps: Click Connect Gmail, complete OAuth flow

Name: Connect Email Account - Microsoft
User Goal: User connects Microsoft 365 via OAuth
Verification Steps: Click Connect Microsoft, complete OAuth flow

Name: Manage Email Senders
User Goal: User configures which accounts can send
Verification Steps: View connected accounts, toggle active/inactive

Name: Email Sync - Gmail/Microsoft
User Goal: Background sync fetches new emails from connected accounts
Verification Steps: Wait for Inngest cron, check logs for sync entries

Name: Message Classification
User Goal: Inbound messages are classified and request completion assessed
Verification Steps: Receive reply, check aiClassification field

Name: Reminder Sending
User Goal: Due reminders are sent automatically for non-responsive requests
Verification Steps: Send request with reminders, wait for reminder delay

Name: Email Queue Processing
User Goal: Rate-limited emails are queued and sent when limits allow
Verification Steps: Send multiple emails, verify queuing and processing

Name: AI Content-Based Risk Scoring
User Goal: AI computes risk based on submission content (not just time)
Verification Steps: Send request, receive reply - risk computed from document content (wrong doc type, expired, incomplete)

Name: AI First-Pass Document Review
User Goal: AI reviews all inbound content (email + attachments) before human
Verification Steps: On email receive, Inngest extracts attachments, runs AI analysis, detects completion, updates request
